job.title: Test Engineer - RF
job.description: yöutop 5 reasönsThis position is currently a temporary work from home/remote position. You must be willing to relocate to Morristown, NJ or Irvine, CA USA once COVID policies/restrictions are lifted. üs umlaut is a 4500+ people strong global full-service cross industry end-to-end partner that applies its deep-running interdisciplinary, collaborative advisory and fulfilment capabilities to change its clients fortunes for the better and - on top of that - add value, quality and focus to their organisations and produce. our öfferPerform RF Interference Hunting operations, including identification and mitigation of sources all over the U.S.Perform Passive Intermodulation (PIM) tests and repair base stationsIdentify source of radio frequency interferenceOperate and maintain your measurement instruments, tools, and vehicleIdentify and plan routes in concert with Interference Hunting managementWork closely with senior engineers at the nation’s biggest carriers to solve interference issuesDrive obligations to successful closure, balancing a “getting it done” attitude combined with “doing it right the first time”Develop visually compelling presentations of your resultsReport project status, action items and next planned steps on a regular basisBachelor's degree in Electrical Engineering, Telecommunications, Computer Science, or equivalentProficient with a spectrum analyzer, and PIM test toolsKnowledge of RF technology, radio propagation, and cellular technologies.Experience in the physical setup of cellular base stationsProficient in computer applications including databases, spreadsheets, and word processingProficient in MS Power PointMust be technically sound, detail oriented with strong troubleshooting skillsAble to work independentlyComfortable in a multi-cultural environmentAbility to handle short deadlines and ad-hoc travel schedulesWillingness to work weekends and holidays if neededTravel up to 90% is expected both domestic and internationalAn entrepreneurial environment with immediate responsibility and a chance to make a difference from the word goInnovative projects with big name clients and exposure to future, cutting edge technologiesUnlimited individual growth opportunities and the ability to create a personalised career pathAccess to a global network with opportunities to live and work abroadAll the support, training and coaching you need to further your career+X.
